properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.connect-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for establishing a new connection

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.logging-enabled
properties.description: Developer use only. Set to true to enable detailed logging of LDAP in system.out.

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.urls
properties.description: Comma separated list of LDAP URLs in a primary,standby order. e.g. ldap://10.240.8.138:389

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.min-idle
properties.description: Min number of idle connections. Setting to greater than zero will mean connections are kept open.

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.max-wait
properties.description: Max interval to wait for a new connection

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.when-exhausted-action
properties.description: Action to take when connection not available. 0 = throw ex, 1 = block, 2 = spawn new connection.

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.test-on-return
properties.description: Set to true to test connections on returning to pool

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.test-while-idle
properties.description: Set to true to test connections when idle

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.num-tests-per-eviction-run
properties.description: Number of connections to test per eviction run

properties.name: com.vennetics.bell.sam.adapters.sdm.ldap.adapters.sdm.pool.min-evictable-idle-time-millis
properties.description: Minimum idle time for a connection to be eligible for eviction
